00038 {
00039 
00040     word       z1 = S->z1;
00041     longword L_z2 = S->L_z2;
00042     word       mp = S->mp;
00043 
00044     word        s1;
00045     longword      L_s2;
00046 
00047     longword      L_temp;
00048 
00049     word        msp, lsp, temp;
00050     word        SO;
00051 
00052     longword    ltmp;       /* for   ADD */
00053     ulongword   utmp;       /* for L_ADD */
00054 
00055     register int        k = 160;
00056 
00057     while (k--) {
00058 
00059     /*  4.2.1   Downscaling of the input signal
00060      */
00061         SO = SASR( *s, 3 ) << 2;
00062         s++;
00063 
00064         assert (SO >= -0x4000); /* downscaled by     */
00065         assert (SO <=  0x3FFC); /* previous routine. */
00066 
00067 
00068     /*  4.2.2   Offset compensation
00069      * 
00070      *  This part implements a high-pass filter and requires extended
00071      *  arithmetic precision for the recursive part of this filter.
00072      *  The input of this procedure is the array so[0...159] and the
00073      *  output the array sof[ 0...159 ].
00074      */
00075         /*   Compute the non-recursive part
00076          */
00077 
00078         s1 = SO - z1;           /* s1 = gsm_sub( *so, z1 ); */
00079         z1 = SO;
00080 
00081         assert(s1 != MIN_WORD);
00082 
00083         /*   Compute the recursive part
00084          */
00085         L_s2 = s1;
00086         L_s2 <<= 15;
00087 
00088         /*   Execution of a 31 bv 16 bits multiplication
00089          */
00090 
00091         msp = SASR( L_z2, 15 );
00092         lsp = L_z2-((longword)msp<<15); /* gsm_L_sub(L_z2,(msp<<15)); */
00093 
00094         L_s2  += GSM_MULT_R( lsp, 32735 );
00095         L_temp = (longword)msp * 32735; /* GSM_L_MULT(msp,32735) >> 1;*/
00096         L_z2   = GSM_L_ADD( L_temp, L_s2 );
00097 
00098         /*    Compute sof[k] with rounding
00099          */
00100         L_temp = GSM_L_ADD( L_z2, 16384 );
00101 
00102     /*   4.2.3  Preemphasis
00103      */
00104 
00105         msp   = GSM_MULT_R( mp, -28180 );
00106         mp    = SASR( L_temp, 15 );
00107         *so++ = GSM_ADD( mp, msp );
00108     }
00109 
00110     S->z1   = z1;
00111     S->L_z2 = L_z2;
00112     S->mp   = mp;
00113 }
